subject: AI & Agents
title: Logging: Capture Decisions, Not Secrets
description: A micro-lesson that makes Logging: Capture Decisions, Not Secrets usable.

hook.text: When the agent fails, logs are your replay. But logs can leak secrets.

buildup.text: You need observability: which tool, which args, which outcome, which error.

discovery.text: Log decisions and IDs, not raw user data. Redact and hash sensitive fields.

twist.text: Over-logging creates risk. Under-logging creates blind spots.
